tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE feedback_notifications (
    notification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    feedback_id INT,
    notification_text TEXT,
    notification_time TIMESTAMP,
    is_read BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (feedback_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE feedback_notifications (notification_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  feedback_id INT,
  notification_text TEXT,
  sent_at TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE email_notification (
    notification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    message TEXT,
    sent_status BOOLEAN,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE notification_trigger (
    trigger_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trigger_name TEXT,
    action TEXT,
    table_affected TEXT,
    trigger_condition TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE triggers ( 
    trigger_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    trigger_name TEXT, 
    table_name TEXT, 
    trigger_condition TEXT, 
    action TEXT 
);
